example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS لاحظ) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM وكيل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدفاع))) (NP (NOUN_PROP فرانك) (NOUN_PROP دونهام))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC (PRON_3MS ه)) (VP (PUNC ") (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ليس) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC منصفا) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (PRON_3MS ه)))) (PUNC ") (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يستمر) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM المحامون)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN الدعوى))) (PP-MNR (PREP في) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الظروف))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: that the lawyers continue in the case in these circumstances

example.arg: أن يستمر المحامون في الدعوى في هذه الظروف
